summary: TAKATA RECALL. FOR THE PAST YEAR PLUS, THE DEALER (PARADISE/CADILLAC) IN TEMECULA CA. HAS REFUSED TO REPAIR THE AIRBAG AND INFLATOR ON RECALL. MY VEHICLE HAS BEEN GIVEN HIGH PRIORITY BECAUSE OF ITS AGE AND HIGH TEMPERATURE WHERE I LIVE. I STOP DRIVING IT BECAUSE OF FEAR FOR MYSELF AND FAMILY. IT ONLY HAS 24,500 MILES IN IT.
